title: Piace: Watashi no Italian
alternative_title: Piacevole! My Italian Cooking, ピアシェ~私のイタリアン~
description: High-schooler Morina Nanase has begun working as a part-timer in an Italian restaurant, Trattoria Festa. As she encounters various quirky co-workers, such as their manager, the child prodigy chef Maro Kitahara, and unique cuisines, she begins to grow as a person.
